World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 1 日星期五 12:49:36 GMT 120
Belgium to use urgent procedure status for nuclear phase-out lawBelgium's Chamber of Representatives has agreed to give the nuclear phase-out law an urgent procedure status, a spokesperson for Energy Minister Tinne van der Straeten said on Friday, confirming a report from Belga news agency. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:36:22 GMT FCA6MDUCZJM7NLWHKJRJ6Y52WE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belgium-use-emergency-procedure-status-nuclear-phase-out-law-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Polish farmers take grain protests to Lithuanian borderPolish farmers protested on the border with Lithuania on Friday against what they say are imports of Ukrainian grain through the Baltic country, something Vilnius denies. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:29:16 GMT PEXVP4FHORJTVDLAIFFYOBGHTU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-take-grain-protests-lithuanian-border-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Kenya, Haiti sign agreement allowing police deploymentKenya and Haiti signed a security deal on Friday that Nairobi hopes will satisfy a domestic court's objections to its plan to send 1,000 police officers to lead a U.N.-approved mission aimed at tackling gang violence in the Caribbean nation. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:26:37 GMT LWPF2MNVPNLCVHJMWI64G5HTC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/kenya-haiti-sign-agreement-allowing-police-deployment-2024-03-01/Reuters世界
EU holds back part of UNRWA payment but boosts Palestinian aidThe European Commission said on Friday it would hold back part of a payment of 82 million euros for the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA) but increase overall aid to the Palestinians by 68 million euros this year. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:11:15 GMT PQQ5WD2IG5PNFJVQQZPW5Q2F4I https://www.reuters.com/world/eu-holds-back-part-unrwa- payment-boosts-palestinian-aid-2024-03-01/Gabriela Baczynska, Andrew Gray世界
Mexico kicks off election campaign with ruling party's Sheinbaum in leadMexico's presidential candidates will start their campaigns on Friday for elections in June, with the ruling party candidate leading in a race that will likely crown a woman to lead Latin America's second-largest nation for the first time. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 12:03:53 GMT OBROMMEY7RI2PHDUJYEBONMMLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-kicks-off-election-campaign-with-ruling-party-sheinbaum-lead-2024-03-01/Diego Oré世界美洲
Ghana LGBTQ activist says friends in hiding after crackdown bill passesGhanaian trans woman and activist Angel Maxine fled to Berlin before parliament passed an anti-LGBTQ bill. She fears for the safety of the friends she has had to leave behind. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:50:23 GMT AOH7XNVL25IXBNZF5NNFCD7GOOD https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ghana-lgbtq-activist-says-friends-hiding-after-crackdown-bill-passes-2024-03-01/Cooper Inveen世界非洲
Pope Francis calls for studies into 'ugly' gender theoryPope Francis on Friday warned of the dangers of so-called gender theory, saying he had commissioned studies into what he condemned as an "ugly ideology" that threatens humanity. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:49:24 GMT N4WIBZSWJJJPNL24FSMKTODQGI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-francis-calls-studies-into-ugly-gender-theory-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Poland to end extended border controls with Slovakia at midnight on SaturdayPoland will end extended border controls with Slovakia at midnight on Saturday, the interior ministry said, after a decline in the threat of illegal migration across that part of the frontier. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:21:51 GMT URY3CDDJK5JIHI57YRDXPPPTGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-ends-extended-border-controls-with-slovakia-midnight-saturday-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Prince Harry lawyers win permission to use payment records at Mirror Group court caseBritain's media minister said on Friday she had agreed to allow documents submitted to a public inquiry to be used by lawyers acting for Prince Harry, singer Elton John and other claimants in their lawsuit against the publisher of the Daily Mail. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:12:00 GMT XCWZC2RS35L3TO2SJMHO74FB5I https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-minister-allows-prince-harry-to-use-inquiry-details-lawsuit-2024-03-01/Reuters世界英国
Yellen says G7 still working on ways to tap frozen Russian assetsThe United States and its allies will keep seeking options to tap $300 billion in frozen Russian sovereign assets, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said after days of rancorous talks failed to seal a deal to aid Ukraine's war effort. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:10:00 GMT C6R5OEAKVRJPJIEP7LZLAK3SWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yellen-says-g7-still-working-ways-to-tap-frozen- Russian-assets-2024-03-01/Andrea Shalal世界欧洲
Yellen says travel restrictions on West Bank not in Israel's interestU.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen criticized Israel for withholding work permits and blocking travel by Palestinians from the occupied West Bank, saying the measures hurt both sides and risked tipping off a broader regional conflict. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:07:21 GMT 7VWB5VHO5FLTZNGA5TQPTQPDZE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yellen-says-travel-restrictions-west-bank-not-israel-interest-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中东地区
